body.p: Opentalk is an extensible add-on framework for the development, deployment, maintenance, and monitoring of distributed applications.
Opentalk is provided in a set of parcels (in the /opentalk directory of your ∏ installation). Use the Parcel Manager to browse the Distributed Computing folder, and to load the desired components.
For complete documentation, refer to the Opentalk Communication Layer Developer's Guide.
